paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation.

detailsData.title: Top Boutique Firm
detailsData.content: Recognized as a top boutique law firm by various publications.

detailsData.title: Elite Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: Specializing in prosecuting and defending patent and intellectual property cases.

detailsData.title: Technical Acumen
detailsData.content: Engineers by training with the ability to handle complex technologies.

address: 4685 MacArthur Court, Suite 390, Newport Beach, California 92660
valueProp: Armond Wilson LLP is a nationally recognized boutique law firm specializing in intellectual property disputes, patent litigation, and appeals. With a track record of significant wins and client settlements, we offer exceptional representation and client service.
